medical_history.chief_complaint: 5-year-old girl admitted with fever and respiratory distress.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms began 10 days prior with daily fever, dry cough, anorexia, fatigue, and night sweats. Fever subsided 5 days after treatment initiation.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Interleukin-12 receptor b1 (IL-12Rb1) deficiency in 3 siblings; one sibling had disseminated tuberculosis and another had extraintestinal salmonellosis.
medical_history.family_history: No known cases of tuberculosis in the family; TST results for mother and siblings were negative.
